question: Andhra Pradesh has recently signed an agreement with which institution to undertake a study to identify corruption in administration?
explanation: The Andhra Pradesh government on November 21, 2019 formally signed an agreement with the Indian Institute of Management-Ahmedabad under which the latter will undertake a study to identify corruption in administration at all levels. Under the agreement, the IIM-A will complete the study by February 2020 and submit its report. IIM-A will come up with guidelines to curb corruption from the village level to the top echelons of the government.
